name: CoDefyne
description:
CoDefyne is a place where we discuss technology, implement ideas and bring together a fresh App / product to life for those who wish to see their ideas come to fruition. It’s our mobile app agency where every App is mind crafted using certain technologies to bring that usability into existence what is originally envisioned.   
We offer services ranging from iOS & Android app development, Webapps and games development using native and hybrid technologies.

locations.address: Office 1410, Tiffany Tower, Jumeira Lake Towers
